name: RIFT AI
description: Rift is the mobile trading app built to help you invest smarter. Borrow against your Bitcoin, analyze market indicators on tokens before you swap, trade perps based on proven market signals, invest into automated strategies, and more - all from your phone. Trading is a performance sport and Rift makes it easier than ever to trade in a data-driven and intelligent way. Rift is incubated by Faraway and backed by a16z, Sequoia Capital, and Lightspeed Venture Partners.
